response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will bring substantial value to you.

Considering the immense benefits this product offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you to secure a competitive edge in your industry.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or if there's any way I can assist you in understanding how this product can meet your specific needs. I am looking forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the growth of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
